backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, question management, full syllabus and chapter-wise mock tests, test attempts with section-based timing, leaderboard functionality, and access control with admin registration including initial setup logic and diagnostic logging.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two features for improving admin registration error messaging: adding an informational popup/banner and displaying unauthorized errors as modal dialogs instead of toast notifications.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and utilities with details on routing, authentication, test interfaces, admin dashboards, and query/mutation patterns.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the Concept Delta navy blue theme and UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, SEO description, and title for the Concept Delta MHT-CET mock test platform.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring React Query client, TanStack Router, theme provider, and toast notifications with strict mode enabled.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Concept Delta branding, quick links, YouTube channel link, social handle, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper component that renders Navbar, main content outlet, and Footer for consistent page structure.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar with Concept Delta branding, authentication controls, admin/student links with dual role verification (useGetCallerUserRole and useIsCallerAdmin), mobile menu, and extensive diagnostic logging including direct backend actor verification.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatic query invalidation on identity changes, and admin token initialization from URL parameters.
Provides a mutation hook for registering admin users by validating and submitting a principal string to the backend, handling success/error states with toast notifications and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterWiseTestMut: Exports mutation hooks for creating chapter-wise tests and assigning questions to them, with automatic query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullSyllabusTestMu: Provides mutation hooks for creating full syllabus tests and assigning section-specific questions to them, invalidating relevant queries after successful operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines query hooks for fetching full syllabus tests, chapter-wise tests, questions, user profiles, and user roles from the backend actor with proper caching and enablement logic.
Provides a mutation hook for creating questions with admin permission verification, detailed error handling, and automatic query invalidation with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestSectionMutatio: Exports mutation hooks for starting and submitting test sections with answers, invalidating test attempt queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and responsive hero image styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminChapterWiseTestC: Admin page for creating chapter-wise tests with question selection, validation for test parameters (name, marks, duration), and automatic navigation after successful creation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Main admin dashboard with tabs for analytics, test management, question gallery, and user management; displays full syllabus and chapter-wise tests with access control for admin users only.
frontend/src/pages/AdminFullSyllabusTest: Admin page for creating full syllabus tests with two sections (Physics/Chemistry and Maths), allowing question selection per section with validation and success handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminQuestionCreate.t: Admin form for creating questions with text/image support, four options with images, correct answer selection, explanation, subject, and class level fields with validation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRegistration.tsx: Admin registration page allowing existing admins to register new admins by principal ID, with authentication checks, confirmation dialogs, and unauthorized access handling.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component that displays hero banner, features, YouTube subscription prompt, and Telegram community section with a call-to-action to get started or login via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays top 10 test results with rankings, scores, and completion times; shows medal icons for top 3 positions with gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/pages/ResultPage.tsx: Shows detailed test attempt results including score breakdown, question-by-question analysis, and provides PDF export functionality for both full syllabus and chapter-wise tests.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Main student dashboard displaying available full syllabus and chapter-wise mock tests with filtering by class level and subject, allowing students to start test attempts.
frontend/src/pages/TestInterface.tsx: Interactive test-taking interface with timer, question navigation, answer selection via radio buttons, and section submission with auto-submit on timeout.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's routing structure using TanStack Router, mapping paths to page components for landing, dashboards, admin pages, test interface, results, and leaderboard.
frontend/src/utils/pdfExport.ts: Generates PDF reports for test results, calculating scores, statistics (correct/incorrect/unanswered), and formatting HTML content with test details, performance indicators, and question-by-question breakdown for both full syllabus and chapter-wise tests.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for parameters like admin tokens across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space (including sidebar, chart, and semantic colors), container settings, border radius variables, custom animations (accordion), and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata for 'Concept Delta' MHT-CET mock test platform, documenting architecture (Motoko backend, React frontend, Internet Identity auth), test types (full syllabus vs chapter-wise), known issues (admin authorization bugs), and feature change history including recent branding updates from 'COEPian Delta' to 'Concept Delta'.
